abstract: John C. Malone, chairman of Liberty Media, said Friday that his company was not in talks to acquire a stake in NBC Universal.
snippet: John C. Malone, chairman of Liberty Media, said Friday that his company was not in talks to acquire a stake in NBC Universal.
lead_paragraph: John C. Malone, chairman of Liberty Media, said Friday that his company was not in talks to acquire a stake in NBC Universal.

headline.main: Malone Denies Talks to Buy NBC Stake
